entity.name: Mockoon
entity.description: We are building Mockoon, a set of open-source API mocking tools for developers. Created in 2017 by Guillaume Monnet, it has since grown to be used by thousands of developers worldwide. Mockoon is a free and open-source project, and we rely on donations to keep it running and improving. We are also providing consulting and cloud services to help sustain the project.

projects.name: Mockoon
projects.description: Mockoon is a set of open-source API mocking tools for developers, including a desktop app and various libraries. It is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

channels.description: Will accept bank transfers. Please e-mail us for details.
We accept donations via GitHub Sponsors.

plans.name: Platinum Sponsor
plans.description: This contribution helps us cover the cost of running the project.

plans.name: Developer compensation
plans.description: This will cover the cost of one developer working part-time on the projects.

plans.name: Developer full-time compensation
plans.description: This will cover the cost of one developer working full-time on the projects.

plans.name: Goodwill plan
plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project.
